article.title: Bundling Solution 2025: Keep Your Unit in Prime Condition

content.text: THEI presents the Bundling Solution 2025 program, an initiative designed to help you maintain your heavy equipment in prime condition with a very attractive offer. This program is a smart solution for efficient and cost-effective preventive maintenance.

Enjoy a special 20% discount on every purchase of a package consisting of Oil, Filter, and S.O.S (Scheduled Oil Sampling). This package includes vital components that ensure your engine operates at peak performance, reduces the risk of unexpected failures, and extends the life of the unit. S.O.S analysis also helps detect potential problems early.

content.alt: Oil, filter, and S.O.S package from THEI

content.text: This offer is valid for all transactions made through Service, Parts.Cat.com, or the nearest THEI branch. Ensure your unit is always in the best condition. Don't miss this limited-time offer, valid from August to September 2025.
